english.segment1: Some things can never be explained. Why every sky still looks the same. And I wonder how my world would look without you
english.segment2: Some things can never be explained. Like how our skies remain the same. And I wonder how the sky would look without my star. Sleep seems a dream away and a year too late. Words that cant be spoken stream out my face
english.segment3: And I want to be selfish. I want to be selfish. I want to be selfish, youre my everything
english.segment4: Some things can never be explained. Why does your love remain unchanged?. Cause I know it wouldnt be the same without you
english.segment5: Sleep seems a dream away and a year too late. Words that cant be spoken stream out your face. And I want to be selfish. I want to be selfish. I want to be selfish, youre my everything
english.segment6: Please dont forget my name. And take me with you when you leave. Ive got a lot to lose. Ive got to let it go
